message.body: Mon fau! I'm free this saturday, any good? Also, do you know who is teaching tomorrow morning for morgan?
Not sure about Morgan. This weekend I will be in NYC for an acupuncture thing!
Boo for us, but yay for you! Are you back by sunday evening?xxx
Probably not. I'm not sure about my return time yet.
Boo. Hmm. When else are you free?
Next week maybe? Monday night. Thursday maybe? I can go to Thursday morning yoga?
Monday is limbs. Boo. I might come to thurs yoga.

I know! I keep offering Monday night bc I keep hoping it will work! The weekend after this is uncertain but maybe Thursday during the day? I'm on spring break but don't want to overpack myself! I do want to see you though!!
This is so difficult! Roll on summer holidays and the end of limbs...
Ah! What is next Thursday and Friday like for you? Also maybe next Wednesday night?
I can do next week wed and thurs eve after 8:45, and fri eve after 8:15. All so late....if you pass through campus in the day time on week days I can also meet for coffee near there. Xxxxx

Oh yeah, I mean that would be when I was free by the time I get home after class, which is usually at like 7:50, shower, and get out of the house again. Ditto for post-aerobics on thurs and post-yoga on fri. Xxx
Lets go to Morgan's 6pm (is that the right time) next weds (spring break so I'm free!) then hang for a bit! Does that work for you? I need you right now!!
